Import County Geographic Centers, and Merge
```{r}
county_centers <- read_csv("../data/county_centers.csv")
```

```{r}
county_centers <- county_centers %>% select(-X1)
```

```{r}
counties <- inner_join(counties, county_centers, by = "county")
```
